GClasses::GNaiveMLE

GClasses::GNaiveMLE Class Reference

This modeler is very similar to Naive Bayes, except even simpler. It just counts the frequency of each output give each input. To generalize, it assumes conditional independence and computes the maximum likelihood output based on the training rows with similar input values. More...

#include <GNaiveBayes.h>

Detailed Description

This modeler is very similar to Naive Bayes, except even simpler. It just counts the frequency of each output give each input. To generalize, it assumes conditional independence and computes the maximum likelihood output based on the training rows with similar input values.
